targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  time_real AS "time",
  drone_id,
  pos_x AS "x",
  pos_y AS "y",
  pos_z AS "z"
FROM drones_position
WHERE drone_id IN ($droneId)
ORDER BY time_real

list.definition: SELECT drone_id FROM drones_position ORDER BY drone_id;
list.label: Drone #
list.name: droneId
list.query: SELECT drone_id FROM drones_position ORDER BY drone_id;
